questions.question_text: Which baseline Change Flow automatically generates a Change task, for Post Implementation Review?

Your customer wants to use the Normal change model, but wants to add another level of approval for changes relating to the Service, SAP Enterprise Services.

What should you do to satisfy this requirement?

choices.B: Add a new Decision to the Normal Change Approval Policy
choices.A: Add a new Policy Input to the Normal Change Approval Policy
choices.C: Add a new Change Approval Policy
choices.D: Add a new Decision to the Normal Change Workflow

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The correct answer is B. You can use the Normal Change Approval Policy and add a new Decision, then set a condition where Services = SAP Enterprise Services

Selected Answer: B
To satisfy the requirement of adding another level of approval for changes relating to the Service, SAP Enterprise Services, while using the Normal change model, you should:
B. Add a new Decision to the Normal Change Approval Policy.
This allows you to define additional approval criteria specific to SAP Enterprise Services within the existing Normal Change Approval Policy.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct. ITSM Tokyo textbook pg. 437

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-service-management/page/product/change-management/concept/change-approval-policy.html

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: ACD
According to the role matrix in the book an itil admin can do the following:
- Create, read, update change record
- Approve or reject a change request
- Delete, copy change record
- Advance change record state
- Fill out risk assessment
- Manage risk assessments and conditions
- Read CAB definition
- Propose standard change template; read standard chg proposals

Selected Answer: ACD
Ans- A, C, D are correct 
because 
B) Delete CAB Definition needs admin role
E) Create and manage Approval Policies needs admin or change_manager role

Selected Answer: ACD
ACD is correct
itil_admin can delete a change request - 
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-service-management/page/product/itsm-workspace/task/delete-change-workspace.html
